TextView.android:text: This application has two modes of operation:
Live Feed: the device receives regular location updates and sends the location coordinates automaticly.
Point to Point: the device receives regular location updates but only sends the location coordinates when a button is pressed.

You can change the frequency of the updates, based on minimum distance covered and/or time passed, by going to the preferences. The frequency of the updates will influence power usage (more frequent = more power used). The firsttime you start the application you should edit the IP address and Port and restart the application.
